mapper.sql: select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.remark, t.is_enabled, t.is_systemic, t.is_deleted, t.created_by, t.created_time, t.last_modified_by, t.last_modified_time, t.deleted_by, t.deleted_time from k_role t
mapper.insert: insert into k_role(id, code, name, remark, sort_index, is_enabled, is_systemic, is_deleted, created_by, created_time) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{remark}, #{sortIndex}, #{isEnabled}, #{isSystemic}, #{isDeleted}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime})

delete from k_role_permission where role_id = #{id};
insert into k_role_permission values
(#{id}, #{checkedId}, ${@cn.koala.persist.domain.YesNo@NO.value}),
(#{id}, #{halfCheckedId}, ${@cn.koala.persist.domain.YesNo@YES.value})
